summary: Learn to order food in English. Restaurant conversation.

story.text:
Waiter: Good evening. A table for two?
Maria: Yes, please.
Waiter: Here are the menus. Are you ready to order?
Maria: Yes. I would like the pasta, please.
Waiter: And for you, sir?
Tadas: I will have the steak, please.
Waiter: Would you like anything to drink?
Maria: Water, please. And you, Tadas?
Tadas: I will have juice.
Waiter: Perfect. Your food will be ready in twenty minutes.

key_phrases.phrase: Would you like anything to drink?
Your food will be ready in...

vocabulary.definition: A person who serves food in a restaurant
